TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 555
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to William T Austin, 12-14-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with William T. Austin, December 14, 1830. Bill and price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 555

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with William T. Austin, December 14, 1830. Bill and price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Bot of*person_mentioned* Wm T Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*1 pr 4 point Blankets----—-----------------------------------— $6.00*/p*
*p*3 3/4 hemp Linen--------------------------------------@4-- 1.88*/p*
*p*2 pr. Woolen half hose--------------@4— 1.00*/p*
*p*2 Silk Hkfs----------------------------------@2— 4.00*/p*
*p*5 lb Coffee---------------------------—@2- 1.25*/p*
*p*10 lb Sugar---------------------- 2.00*/p*
*p*$16.13*/p* *p*To articles for *person_mentioned*Jose Maria*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*1 lb. Bread-------------- .19*/p*
*p*1 1/2 hemp Linen----------------------------@4— . 75*/p*
*p*1 pr half hose-----------------------------------@4__ . 50*/p*
*p*1 Blanket---------—------------------------------- 3.00*/p*
*p*1 Pocket knife------------------------------------ .37*/p*
*p*$20.94*/p* *p**location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="12-14-1830">Decr. 14th 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
